page.title: 14Housing
page.content: cont. now falling down. {Garden:Front} We have two gardens one on either side of the house.We call the smaller one the front garden.In the front we have now a "Weeping Willow"but before there was just a shed. {Garden:Back} This is about half an acre.In it we have two main garden patches,one we use for strawberries which we sell every yearand also a vegetable patch,where we grow,runner beans,sprouts,cabbages etc.My father built a chicken pen which was built on the side of a brick shed.We later found this was the origenal toilet.The toilet consisting of a brick frame with a small hole in it.The shed has a slate roof.We have 3 apple trees the rest is grass.
